definition: characterized by extreme economy of expression or omission of superfluous elements
details:
adjective
- characterized by extreme economy of expression or omission of superfluous elements
= example: characterized by extreme economy of expression or omission of superfluous elements
= synonyms: elliptical
- rounded like an egg
= synonyms: elliptical, egg-shaped, oval, oval-shaped, ovate, oviform, ovoid, prolate
- (of a leaf shape) in the form of an ellipse
